All chemical reactions involve energy changes.
All isotopes of an element share the same atomic number.

All electrical insulators resist electron flow.
All radioactive materials decay over time.

All amorphous solids lack long-range molecular order.
All fluids include both liquids and gases.
All phase changes involve latent heat.
All nuclear reactions alter atomic nuclei.

All reduction reactions involve gain of electrons.

All salts dissociate into ions in water.

All ceramics are inorganic and nonmetallic.

All gears transmit rotational motion.

All diodes allow current to flow in one direction.
All transistors amplify or switch electronic signals.
All integrated circuits contain multiple electronic components.
All optical fibers transmit light with minimal loss.
All lasers emit coherent light.

All visible light spans wavelengths from 400 to 700 nanometers.

All lunar eclipses occur during full moons.
All solar eclipses occur during new moons.
